comment.body: There is no “clone” menui tem in ZeroHello. In fact there is no menu at all. What to do?

> [kangsterizer](#comment_1_1KpwResehV4JtoLfvnsXcV9wowXUhJNev7): Use clone in zeroblog instead of zerohello.

What I meant was: On the ZeroBlog box on ZeroHello there is no “clone” option like shown on the howto. I found it in the sidebar, though.

Thanks!

Where is the private key to the site when you have cloned it from the web interface?
When I use siteCreate from the CLI, the private and the public keys are both written to the terminal, but I can't seem to find the private key when I have used the webui.

Anyone?
Is there an easy way to update one's own blog if its a clone of this blog?
